name: Lean 4 Development

LLM_API_KEY.description: API key for the LLM service. In GitHub Codespaces, configure this in your user secrets (Settings > Codespaces > Secrets). For local Dev Containers, set LLM_API_KEY in your local environment.

postCreateCommand: curl -sSf https://raw.githubusercontent.com/leanprover/elan/master/elan-init.sh | sh -s -- -y --default-toolchain none && echo 'source $HOME/.elan/env' >> ~/.bashrc && echo 'source $HOME/.elan/env' >> ~/.zshrc && . $HOME/.elan/env && lake build react-agent
